protalAuthEnable.name: protalAuthEnable
protalAuthEnable.name[zh_CN]: 是否允许自动打开网页认证
protalAuthEnable.description: Allow auto open Web for authentication

resetWifiOSDEnableTimeout.name: resetWifiOSDEnableTimeout
resetWifiOSDEnableTimeout.name[zh_CN]: 重新显示网络连接OSD超时
resetWifiOSDEnableTimeout.description: Allow display of network connection OSD

disableFailureNotify.name: disableFailureNotify
disableFailureNotify.name[zh_CN]: 当网络连接失败后,true:不弹出消息,false:弹出消息
disableFailureNotify.description: if network connect failure: true:do not notify message, false:notify message
